title: Emotional healing with non-verbal hypnosis / PRESENCE & FASCINATION
description:
Dr. Marco Paret's students are exercising the unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques that they learned at his masterclass, Presence and Fascination. One of the student entered in a powerful hypnotic induction and crisis that healed her emotional being. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
